definitions.definition: To the full or entire extent.
examples: It is entirely up to you where we go, as I’ll be happy with anywhere.
The cake hadn’t entirely been eaten, so some was saved for later.

definitions.definition: To the exclusion of others; solely;
examples: This part of the park is used entirely by the workers; everyone else will have to go to the other side.

main_definition: To the full or entire extent.
secondary_definitions: To the exclusion of others; solely;
